scenes.text: Would you believe me if I told you there's a way to make hard things feel easy?
scenes.prompt: Standing cartoon person with raised eyebrow and skeptical expression, arms crossed. A floating thought bubble above shows a heavy boulder transforming into a feather. The person looks intrigued but doubtful. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: An actual system that tricks your brain into doing things you've been avoiding for months.
scenes.prompt: A cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe, looking confused and walking on a path of arrows that loop back toward a glowing task icon. The brain follows the arrows without realizing it is being guided. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: And I figured it out from a guy who burned his own ships.
scenes.prompt: Silhouette of a man in conquistador armor standing on a beach, watching multiple wooden ships engulfed in flames on the water. Orange fire reflects on the waves. The figure stands with arms crossed, determined. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: In 1519, a Spanish conquistador named Hernán Cortés landed in Mexico with 600 men to face millions of Aztecs.
scenes.prompt: Split scene. Left side: a conquistador in metal armor with plumed helmet standing on a Mexican beach with 600 soldiers behind him. Right side: an overwhelming mass of Aztec warriors with feathered headdresses stretching to the horizon. The contrast in numbers is dramatic. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

Conquistador soldiers pointing desperately toward wooden ships anchored offshore. Their body language shows fear and urgency to escape. Sweat drops fly off their faces. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

A conquistador in metal armor holding a lit torch, touching it to the wooden hull of a ship. The first flames begin to spread across the wood. His expression is calm and deliberate. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

Wide shot of a beach with multiple wooden ships engulfed in massive flames. Fire consumes every single vessel. The flames reflect on the water. Complete destruction. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Standing cartoon person with jaw dropped, hands on head, eyes wide in disbelief. A question mark floats beside them. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Large bold text showing 'YES' with a checkmark beside it. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Standing cartoon person tapping their temple with one finger, eyes squinting in thought. A question mark floats beside them. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Large bold text showing 'ALSO YES' with two checkmarks beside it. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Because Cortés understood something about the human brain that explains why you can scroll TikTok for three hours but can't study for thirty minutes.
scenes.prompt: Split scene. Left side: standing cartoon person happily scrolling phone with a clock showing 3 hours passed, content expression. Right side: standing cartoon person slumped over a book with a clock showing only 30 minutes, exhausted defeated expression. A conquistador silhouette observes knowingly in the background. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Once you understand it, you can use your biology against itself.
scenes.prompt: Standing cartoon person with a clever expression, holding puppet strings attached to a cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe. The brain looks confused as it is being controlled. The person has turned the tables. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Let me show you five systems that'll feel like cheating.
scenes.prompt: Standing cartoon person leaning in with a knowing smile, holding up five fingers. Five glowing system icons float beside them. The presentation is inviting and slightly mischievous. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
